alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 4:18PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT ITASCA...NORTHERN AITKIN...NORTHEASTERN CASS...EASTERN KOOCHICHING...NORTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS AND NORTHWESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES... At 417 PM CST, moderate to heavy snow showers were along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Voyageurs National Park, to 13 miles southeast of Scenic State Park, to Outing, and moving east at 55 mph. Visibilities of 1/2 mile or less, wind gusts up to 30 mph, and a rapid coating of snow on roads are expected with these moderate to heavy snow showers. Locations impacted include... Hibbing, Grand Rapids, Big Sandy Lake, Lake Vermilion, Virginia, Chisholm, Eveleth, Mountain Iron, Cohasset, Coleraine, Gilbert, Keewatin, Buhl, Nashwauk, Biwabik, Deer River, Cherry, Swan River, Hill City, and Cook. Be prepared for changing visibility and road conditions. Reduce your speed and allow more space between you and the vehicle in front of you.
